text:
Chinese Electric Car Maker Kandi Seals 4,000-Car Deal 
Are China's electric car sales getting a little charged up? Kandi Technologies Group (NASDAQ:KNDI), a Chinese maker of budget and car-sharing electric vehicles, has inked a new sales contract worth $89 million that significantly steps up its pace and plumbs the possibilities of online electric car ... 08:41 PM ET Tesla Stock Near High As Toyota Shows 312-Mile Mirai 
Is hybrid car pioneer Toyota Motor (NYSE:TM) about to give electric car startup Tesla Motors (NYSE:TM) a run for its money? Toyota's Mirai hydrogen fuel cell car — an angular midsize sedan expected to sell for $57,500 — will get an EPA-estimated driving range of 312 miles between ... 06:59 PM ET Auto Sales Continue Bull Run 
10 June U.S. auto sales rose 3.9% vs. June '14 to 1.48 mil units, a 17.1-mil-a-year pace, the most since '05, Ward's Auto said. It was the 2nd straight month the annualized rate topped 17 mil. Fiat Chrysler (NYSE:FCAU) rose 8.2% to 185,035 units, below consensus. Ford (NYSE:F) rose 2% to 225,647, ... 07/02/2015 06:46 PM ET Tesla Hits 10-Month High As Q2 Car Sales Pave Way 
In a move analysts call good for the next earnings report and beyond, Tesla Motors (NASDAQ:TSLA) outran its own guidance Thursday, announcing second-quarter deliveries of 11,507 Model S sedans — vs. the 10,000 to 11,000 anticipated. Tesla stock set a new 10-month high in the stock market ... 07/02/2015 05:47 PM ET Netflix Beware? Cord Cutters Change Web TV Too 
Not only are young adults more likely to "cut the cord" and give up pay-TV services, they're also more likely to switch among providers of Internet video streaming services, says a BMO Capital Markets report. Chip designer Mellanox Technologies is banking on newly unveiled innovations to quell doubts and extend its recent flurry of robust earnings deep into 2016. The Israel-based company, a designer of chips used in servers and data storage systems, has generated strong earnings growth in recent ... 07/02/2015 06:20 PM ET What Is Beyond Vision-Loss Blockbuster For Regeneron? 
As people get older, they are more prone to vision loss from age-related macular degeneration. The severe "wet" version of the condition is the leading cause of blindness in the U.S., afflicting millions of people over 55. When it comes to providing software development and IT solutions, Luxoft Holding doesn't always move with the rest of the pack. Luxoft (NYSE:LXFT) is a developer of software and next-generation IT solutions to a global client base of mainly large multinationals.
